Title: Authorizes the commissioner of labor and the workers' compensation board to issue stop-work orders
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of labor and the workers' compensation board to issue stop-work orders; establishes procedure for the issuance of such orders; establishes penalties for failure to comply with such orders.
LawCode: Amd §§21 & 224-b, add §21-g, Lab L; add §142-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to the issuing of stop-work orders
